definition: Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge

sentences.english: Yamada immediately sent Misaki Sato and led the troops to wipe hair four.
sentences.chinese: 山田立刻派佐藤和毛四帶領部隊前往進行清剿。

sentences.english: The police are trying to suppress the sale of dangerous drugs.
sentences.chinese: 警方正試圖清剿毒品販。

sentences.english: China's nationwide campaign to crack down on pornographic websites is in full swing.
sentences.chinese: 中國正在全國範圍內大力開展清剿黃色網站的行動。

sentences.english: With the relentless eradication, Khalid has come up with a strategy.
sentences.chinese: 面對無休止的清剿，哈立德想出了一個對付的策略。

sentences.english: The military also is ready to clear the Shanghai underground organization.
sentences.chinese: 軍統方面也正準備清剿上海地下黨組織。

definition: to encircle and annihilate/refers to repeated campaigns of the Guomindang against the communists from 1930 onwards
to hunt and arrest (fugitives)/to track down and arrest/a manhunt
remaining evil element/surviving members (of evil former regime)/dregs (of colonial administration)
to send armed forces to suppress
to fish by casting a net/to capture/to surround and seize
stronghold/defended military base/base for operations/strategic point/foothold/(market) presence
